title: Trolling in ranked? Thoughts?

embed.description: upload webm files. share webm files. webm hosting. convert gif, avi, mp4 to webm

body: Now that we don't have a tribunal is there any guarantee that trolls will be punished? Is there even any incentive to be nice and not flame if your team is just going to do this to you?

replies.body: Tribunal was the best way for me to vent back in the day. That could just be an honest mistake, either way it made me chuckle.
